text: Motion
Motion
Hehe, it's finally done!

I've summarized the schedule until the live on this poster
board! How's this? It's easy to understand, right?
──Now, all that's left is to stick the poster board──
──Alright, it's perfect!"

Yes! With this, this area of the warehouse
has become our territory!

According to the Producer, this area
will be designated for us exclusively──

When we need to store our belongings or make
something for the live, we'll come here.
Yes!

......But, I feel a bit guilty for taking such a good spot.
Are the other units okay?

Well...... we're probably the only ones who'll be
starting any projects... So, they should be fine, right...?
Ah...... That's true......

──But still, our permitted area is only up
to this line in the warehouse!
We must defend this to the end! Got it?
Yes! / Yes! / Okay... / Yes!
──...It feels like a secret base, doesn't it...?
Oh, you're on it!
Producer-sama...

Producer, thank you for this wonderful location.
We're already using it right away.

Yeah. Make good use of it.
──Once again, let's work hard together from now on!
Yes! / Yes! / Yeah / Yes... / Yeah
